Label.en: The paintings are interesting because they tell us how Nebamun wanted himself to be viewed...
Label.fr: The paintings are interesting because they tell us how Nebamun wanted himself to be viewed...
Label.es: The paintings are interesting because they tell us how Nebamun wanted himself to be viewed...

Label.en: It's important to remember that only the rich, scribes and priests, could read
Label.fr: It's important to remember that only the rich, scribes and priests, could read
Label.es: It's important to remember that only the rich, scribes and priests, could read

Label.en: And so Nebamun is bragging to other elites how fantastic his life was!
Label.fr: And so Nebamun is bragging to other elites how fantastic his life was!
Label.es: And so Nebamun is bragging to other elites how fantastic his life was!

Label.en: Agreed! He shows off his beautiful wife and daughter...
Label.fr: Agreed! He shows off his beautiful wife and daughter...
Label.es: Agreed! He shows off his beautiful wife and daughter...

Label.en: His skill in hunting and exploring...
Label.fr: His skill in hunting and exploring...
Label.es: His skill in hunting and exploring...

Label.en: And his super talented cat!
Label.fr: And his super talented cat!
Label.es: And his super talented cat!

Label.en: How do you show age and status and power in a painting?
Label.fr: How do you show age and status and power in a painting?
Label.es: How do you show age and status and power in a painting?

Label.en: With relative size, of course!
Label.fr: With relative size, of course!
Label.es: With relative size, of course!

Label.en: Nebamun is the largest, the leader of the house! His wife is smaller, and his daughter is smaller still!
Label.fr: Nebamun is the largest, the leader of the house! His wife is smaller, and his daughter is smaller still!
Label.es: Nebamun is the largest, the leader of the house! His wife is smaller, and his daughter is smaller still!

Label.en: His pose and actions are unrealistic... he would not likely be hunting while standing on his boat with his daughter between his legs!
Label.fr: His pose and actions are unrealistic... he would not likely be hunting while standing on his boat with his daughter between his legs!
Label.es: His pose and actions are unrealistic... he would not likely be hunting while standing on his boat with his daughter between his legs!

Label.en: But realism is less fun than showing off every one of your skills at the same time!
Label.fr: But realism is less fun than showing off every one of your skills at the same time!
Label.es: But realism is less fun than showing off every one of your skills at the same time!

Label.en: And if it wasn't clear enough how excellent his life is... the hieroglyphics say it explicitly!
Label.fr: And if it wasn't clear enough how excellent his life is... the hieroglyphics say it explicitly!
Label.es: And if it wasn't clear enough how excellent his life is... the hieroglyphics say it explicitly!

Label.en: You might also notice how there's barely any empty space...
Label.fr: You might also notice how there's barely any empty space...
Label.es: You might also notice how there's barely any empty space...

Label.en: It's called 'horror vacui' in Latin... and was popular in paintings for a long time... like in this Greek Vase
Label.fr: It's called 'horror vacui' in Latin... and was popular in paintings for a long time... like in this Greek Vase
Label.es: It's called 'horror vacui' in Latin... and was popular in paintings for a long time... like in this Greek Vase

Label.en: Every spare corner is decorated with lush scenery... why leave space when you can show MORE STUFF!
Label.fr: Every spare corner is decorated with lush scenery... why leave space when you can show MORE STUFF!
Label.es: Every spare corner is decorated with lush scenery... why leave space when you can show MORE STUFF!
